data.name: 16 Planes:Return
data.detailed_description:
"Sixteen Faces: Return" is a horrible, slightly bloody plot to solve puzzles. The main content of the game is about the hero in a series of strange dreams, waking up in his bed, but the outside world is no longer the same world, so he embarked on the journey to find the truth.
The game contains thrilling pictures and scenes. Players with heart disease or poor acceptance should be accompanied by friends to play the game. In the follow-up, they will make friends or LAN online mode.

Game features


·Rich Achievement System
·Numerous props for interaction
·bonus scene
·Voice system dubbed by the producer
·Various plot trends for players to choose
·Open end

The game contains thrilling pictures and scenes. Players with heart disease or poor acceptance should be accompanied by friends to play the game. In the follow-up, they will make friends or LAN online mode.

data.short_description: When you feel like you have slept for a long time and suddenly wake up to find that the world has changed and you have grown into middle age, who is the first person you think of as your closest relative?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 (64x)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770/AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Sound Card Compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/8/10 (64x)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD FX 9590
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Sound Card Compatible with DirectX
